forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a canopy of sunny skies, punctuated by a gentle westward wind that carries the scent of salt and urban life alike. The temperature creeps near 67, offering a pleasant embrace that teeters into a cooler interlude as the afternoon beckons. The iconic outline of the Golden Gate emerges clear against the radiant blue, with wispy clouds skirting the edges, hinting at the ever-present marine layer that whispers of a coastal charm. 

As evening approaches, the promise of a mostly clear night invites one to stroll or perhaps settle into an outdoor café for a leisurely sip of something nice as the sun dips beyond the horizon. A light sweater may safeguard against the encroaching chill, perfect for chasing that fleeting warmth while savoring the vibrant pulse of the city. Evening activities could range from catching a live band in the Mission to exploring the artistic vibe at a local gallery; today’s pleasant weather sets the stage for meaningful moments in this timeless urban playground.
